mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(pL) FROM (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT PROD_CD) pL FROM cart_opt WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} GROUP BY PROD_CD) AS subquery WHERE pL = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_opt (cust_id, prod_cd, prod_name, opt_cd, opt_name, opt_qty, opt_price, tot_opt_price) values (#{custId}, #{prodCd}, #{prodName}, #{optCd}, #{optName}, #{optQty}, #{optPrice}, #{optQty}*#{optPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT CUST_ID custId , PROD_CD prodCd , PROD_NAME prodName , COUNT(*) prodQty , SUM(TOT_OPT_PRICE) totProdPrice , floor(SUM(TOT_OPT_PRICE/100)) paymtPnt FROM cart_opt WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} AND PROD_CD = #{prodCd} group by PROD_CD, PROD_CD, PROD_NAME
